<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs=""
>
[Potion of Flying](/Equipment.aspx?ID=189)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Upon drinking this effervescent concoction, you gain a fly Speed of 40 feet for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Potion of Flying
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Potion of Flying (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The fly Speed lasts for 1 hour.
name: Potion of Flying
